places.name: Lekki Centre
places.description: A peaceful natural reserve where you can experience wildlife, walk on Africa's longest canopy walkway, and enjoy picnic spots amidst lush greenery.

places.name: Nike Art Gallery
places.address: No. 2, Oba Yekini Elegushi Rd, Ikate Elegushi, Lekki, Lagos, Nigeria
places.description: A vibrant art gallery showcasing contemporary Nigerian art, crafts, and textiles from renowned artists, and a hub for cultural inspiration.

places.name: Freedom Park
places.address: Broad Street, Lagos Island, Lagos, Nigeria
places.description: This historic park, formerly a colonial prison, is now a recreational and cultural site for concerts, exhibitions, and outdoor relaxation.

places.name: Elegushi Beach
places.description: A lively private beach known for its fun atmosphere, local cuisine, music, and opportunities for relaxation or partying by the ocean.

places.name: National Museum Lagos
places.description: A museum showcasing Nigeria's rich history and cultural artifacts, including traditional art, sculptures, and archaeological exhibits.

places.name: Terra Kulture
places.address: 1376 Tiamiyu Savage St, Victoria Island, Lagos, Nigeria
places.description: A cultural center offering a mix of art, theatre, food, and exhibitions, promoting Nigerian heritage and creativity.

places.name: Ikeja City Mall
places.address: Obafemi Awolowo Way, Ikeja, Lagos, Nigeria
places.description: A modern shopping mall offering retail therapy, dining options, entertainment, and a lively social atmosphere.

places.name: Third Mainland Bridge
places.address: Connecting Lagos Island and the Mainland, Lagos, Nigeria
places.description: One of the longest bridges in Africa, providing stunning views of Lagos' skyline and a vital route connecting the city.
